verifyEmail.title:
Kulungile, iprofayile yakho igqityiwe.
Ngoku sifuna ukuba uqinisekise idilesi ye-imeyile ngokucofa ikhonkco kwi-imeyile esigqiba kukuthumelela yona.
Emva koko unokuqalisa ngokwakha ifama yakho.
verifyEmail.title2:
Ungajonga kwaye uhlele iprofayile yakho nangaliphi na ixesha ngokucofa i icon yeprofayile esekunene phezulu kwesikrini.
Ukuba i-imeyile ayifikanga vele ucofe u-'thumela kwakhona'

profileImage.title: Nceda ujonge ii-imeyile zakho ukuze uqinisekise idilesi yemeyile yakho ngaphambi kokuba uqhubeke - ukuba awuwuboni umyalezo wethu wokungqinisisa usenokuba kumyalezo wakho ongugaxekile okanye ongeyiyo.
profileImage.title2: Khetha iFarmSmarter avatar okanye ulayishe umfanekiso wakho weprofayile apha.
profileImage.selectImage: Nceda ukhethe iFarmsmarter avatar okanye ulayishe umfanekiso wakho weprofayile ukuze uqhubeke.

farmName.selectName: Nceda ufake igama lefama ukuze uqhubeke.
farmName.title: Ukuseta ifama yakho sifuna iinkcukacha ezimbalwa ukuze siqiniseke ukuba sikunika elona cebiso lilungileyo
farmName.name: igama lefama

farmSetup.title: ukumiswa kwefama
farmSetup.title2: Ngokuqinisekisa ubunini bomhlaba wakho sinokukuxhasa ekubhaliseni umhlaba wakho kunye nokufumana imali kamva.
farmSetup.selectError: Nceda ukhethe ubunini beefama ukuze uqhubeke.

farmMap.title: Ngaba le yindawo echanekileyo yefama yakho? Ukuba akunjalo, ungabamba kwaye urhuqe isikhonkwane semephu kwindawo echanekileyo kwimephu. Siza kusebenzisa le ndawo ukuhanjiswa kweefama kunye nokuqokelela kamva.

app.notloggeds: Nceda ungene okanye ubhalisele ukwakha iprofayile yakho yasefama.

home.farmNotFound: Awunayo ifama okwangoku â€“ ngoku unokongeza ifama yakho yokuqala.
home.deleteMsg: Oku kuya kucima ngokusisigxina onke amasimi, iimephu, izityalo kunye nembali ehambelana nefama yakho.
home.title: Le yideshibhodi yakho yefama eyenzelwe wena apho unokufikelela kulwazi malunga, kwaye wenze iifama ezintsha.
home.title2: Xa ucofa ifama uya kukwazi ukubona amasimi kunye nezityalo ezibhaliselwe loo fama kunye nolunye ulwazi oluninzi ukukunceda wenze uninzi lobomi bakho bokulima.
home.title3: Qaphela ukuba ukuba ukhetha ukucima ifama, yonke idatha yaloo fama iya kulahleka.

farm.deleteMsg: Oku kuya kuzicima ngokusisigxina zonke iimephu, izityalo kunye nolwazi olubhaliselwe lo mmandla kwifama yakho.

fieldName.selectNameError: Nceda ngenisa igama lendawo ukuze uqhubeke.

navBar.title: sibala isivuno sesityalo ngokwendawo yentsimi yakho kunye nomndilili wengingqi yakho
navBar.title2: Isivuno ngumlinganiselo owomileyo wobunzima, hayi ubunzima ngexesha lokuvuna.
navBar.title3: Ukuba unezityalo ezininzi entsimini isivuno siya kuba ngaphantsi kunoko kubonisiwe.
navBar.walkText: Cofa iqhosha lokuhamba ngokukhawuleza nje ukuba ulungele ukuqala ukuhamba ujikeleze intsimi yakho.
navBar.walkText1: Unokukhetha ukuhlela ngokubamba izikhonkwane kwaye utsalele kwindawo echanekileyo
navBar.drawText: Cofa iqhosha lepensile ukuze uqalise. Emva koko cofa kwindawo apho ufuna umgca wakho womda uqale kwaye iphini yakho yokuqala yemephu etyheli iya kubhalisa. Inqaku elilandelayo olicofayo kwisikrini liya kuqhagamshela umgca osuka kwiphini lokuqala. Ngalo lonke ixesha ucofa iyakongeza enye iphini kwindawo ejikeleze umda wakho de ubuyele apho uqale khona. Xa ugcina, umgca uya kudibanisa kwindawo yakho yokuqala ukugqiba imilo. Ukususa inqaku, cofa iqhosha lokubuyela umva kwaye iqhosha lokugqibela olifakileyo liya kususwa. Emva koko unokuqhubeka nokubeka amanqaku kwindawo yakho de ugqibe.
navBar.drawText1: Ungabamba iphini kwaye uyitsalele kwindawo echanekileyo ukuba ayilunganga. Xa wonwabile yimephu cofa gcina. Emva kokugcina awukwazi ukutshintsha imephu njengoko siza kubala ngokusekwe kule ndawo yezityalo zakho.
navBar.drawText2: Ukususa inqaku, cofa eli qhosha lokubuyela umva kwaye iqhosha lokugqibela olifakileyo liya kususwa. Emva koko unokuqhubeka nokubeka izikhonkwane kwibala lakho de ugqibe.

fields.question: sathini isivuno sakho sisonke kwesi sityalo?
fields.title: Uqikelelo olulungileyo lulungile, sinokukunceda ukuba ubeke esweni impumelelo yentsimi yakho njengoko siqhubeka.
fields.saveHarvest: xa usigcinile esi sivuno ungakhetha isityalo esitsha oza kusilima kule ntsimi.
fields.tempSuggession: Ukuba unezityalo ezininzi entsimini isivuno siya kuba sezantsi ngokomlinganiselo.
fields.deleteMsg: Oku kuya kucima ngokusisigxina lonke ulwazi olubhalisiweyo kwesi sityalo kwintsimi yakho.
fields.fieldtext1: Eli liphepha lakho lasekhaya lasekhaya apho unokulawula izityalo zakho kwaye ufumane elona cebiso lilungileyo kwiingcali zeFarmSmarter.
fields.fieldtext2: Sibala izivuno zesityalo ngokwendawo yentsimi yakho kunye nomndilili wesivuno sommandla wakho. Isivuno ngumlinganiselo owomileyo wobunzima, hayi ubunzima ngexesha lokuvuna.
fields.fieldtext3: Ukuba unezityalo ezininzi entsimini isivuno siya kuba ngaphantsi kunoko kubonisiwe.
fields.fieldtext4: Ngolwazi oluneenkcukacha ungasebenzisa izikhokelo zezityalo kwisityalo ngasinye kwaye xa ulungele ukuvuna isityalo sakho, vele usazise kwaye sinokubhala impumelelo yakho yesivuno!
fields.cropfailedde: Esi sityalo siya kucinywa kwizityalo zakho zentsimi

drawFields.placePin: Beka iphini kwindawo yakho. cofa kwi icon yepensile emva kokubeka iphini kwindawo yakho. Thepha ukuzoba ujikeleze umda wakho wentsimi.

walkField.title: IFamaSmarter iya kwakha imephu yakho yentsimi njengoko ujikeleza umda wakho wentsimi.
walkField.content: Ingaba uqinisekile? Emva kokuba ibala ligciniwe asiyi kukwazi ukutshintsha imilo kamva. Ungavala oku kwaye uqhubeke nokuhlela ukuba uyafuna.

cropWelcome.terms: Ngokusazisa ukuba ukhule ntoni kwisizini ephelileyo ebaleni. IFamaSmarter inokunika ingcebiso ngokusekwe kwindawo yakho yentsimi kwaye uqalise ukwakha isicwangciso sobudlelwane bezityalo ukunceda ifama yakho ibe nemveliso ngakumbi.
cropWelcome.dont: Sukuba nexhala - ukuba ibala litsha sisenako ukunika iingcebiso, masazise nje!

crops.title: Iingcebiso ngesityalo ziyilelwe ukunika izityalo zakho nomhlaba wakho isiqalo esisempilweni. Ngokujikelezisa iintlobo ngeentlobo zezityalo singanciphisa ukusetyenziswa kwesichumiso kwaye siwuphucule ngokwendalo umhlaba.
crops.title2: Ukuba ufuna ukwenza ukhetho olwahlukileyo izivuno zakho zisenokungaphucuki.
crops.title3: IFarmSmarter icebisa ukuba ukhethe esinye sezi zityalo ukuze ufumane elona thuba lihle lokuphumelela.
crops.noCrops: Akukho kujikeleziswa kwesityalo kolu sapho lwezityalo

oldCrop.title: Nceda ngenisa isityalo sakho kwibhokisi yokubhaliweyo engezantsi, asizukwazi ukunika elona cebiso lilungileyo lokujikelezisa kodwa siyakongeza oku kukhetho lwethu lwezityalo oluzayo ngokukhawuleza kangangoko sinakho!
oldCrop.name: igama lesityalo
oldCrop.selectCrop: khetha esona sityalo siphambili usikhule kule ntsimi kwisizini edlulileyo.

plantPlan.title: IFarmSmarter ixhasa ukulinywa kwezityalo ezifikelela kwisithathu kwintsimi enye. Kodwa, unokubambelela ngesityalo esinye.
plantPlan.title2: Kubalulekile ukuba izityalo ezininzi zingakhuphisani ngezondlo, ngoko ke sijonge ukunika iingcebiso zezityalo ezincedisanayo kujikeleziso lwesityalo sakho naphina apho kunokwenzeka.
plantPlan.question: Ngaba uya kulima esinye isityalo kule ntsimi?

yield.title:
IFamaSmarter iya kulandelela imveliso yefama yakho ukusuka kwelinye ixesha ukuya kwelinye.
Ngokunika isivuno sakho sokugqibela kule ntsimi singakunceda ukuba ubeke iliso kwimpilo yentsimi yakho ekuhambeni kwexesha.
yield.title2: Khetha umlinganiselo ofanelekileyo wesityalo sakho kwaye siya kubalela okuseleyo!
yield.question: sithini isivuno sakho sisonke kwesi sityalo sonyaka ophelileyo?
yield.fineEstimate: Uqikelelo olulungileyo lulungile, sinokukunceda ukuba ubeke esweni impumelelo yentsimi yakho njengoko siqhubeka.

noCrop.title:
Nceda ngenisa isityalo sakho kwibhokisi yokubhaliweyo engezantsi, asizukwazi ukunika iingcebiso ezingcono zokujikelezisa kodwa siyakongeza oku kwisityalo sethu sexesha elizayo.
ukhetho ngokukhawuleza kangangoko sinakho!
noCrop.name: igama lesityalo

fieldPlant.name: igama lesityalo
fieldPlant.question: Ngaba uya kulima esinye isityalo kule ntsimi?

drawField.title: Cofa ipensile ukuqalisa imephu yendawo. Emva koko tsala iphini elibhlowu kwindawo yokuqala kumda wentsimi yakho.
drawField.title2:
Cofa ukwenza imigca ecaleni komda wentsimi. IFamaSmarter iyakuzoba umgca phakathi kwezikhonkwane zakho. Masihambe siqhubeke ngale ndlela de
Umda wentsimi yakho ugqityiwe.

farmAddress.setError: ulungelelwaniso lwefama okanye idilesi iyafuneka ukuze kuqhutyekwe phambili.
farmAddress.title: Indawo okuyo ifama iya kusetyenziswa xa uhambisa incwadi okanye ingqokelela ngeFarmSmarter app.
farmAddress.or: okanye faka idilesi yokuhanjiswa kwefama yakho

cropDoc.title: Ukuba ukuxilongwa kubonakala kungalunganga siya kwenza inqaku kwaye sihlolisise. Okwangoku ungabona uluhlu olupheleleyo lwezifo apha:
cropDoc.offlineinfo: Kubonakala ngathi awukho kwi-intanethi ngoku. Nje ukuba ube noqhagamshelo lwe-intanethi siza kukuqhagamshela nethala leencwadi lethu lezityalo nezifo ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ozifunayo.

cropClinic.hello: Molo, wamkelekile kwikliniki yezityalo yaseFarmSmarter, masijonge ingxaki.
cropClinic.let: Esi sixhobo se-AI ngoku sichonga izifo ezinqongopheleyo zezityalo eziquka umbona, amazimba, iCassava & Yam.
cropClinic.photo: Yonke ifoto oyifakileyo iyakunceda ukuba ifunde ngakumbi!.
cropClinic.title: ukufumana owona mfanekiso ulungileyo wokuxilongwa
cropClinic.description: Iklinikhi yethu yezityalo esebenza ngamandla e-AI isebenza ngokujonga imifanekiso oyinikezelayo ngesityalo kunye neempawu zaso. Ungcono umfanekiso, ukuxilongwa ngokuchanekileyo kuya kuba. Unokukhetha ukuthatha umfanekiso ngekhamera yakho okanye ulayishe umfanekiso osele ukhona kwigalari yakho. Xa uthatha ifoto yakho, nceda ugxininise kwicandelo lesityalo esibonisa ezona mpawu zicacileyo, umzekelo; igqabi elipheleleyo okanye inxalenye yegqabi ebonisa isifo, isiqhamo esipheleleyo okanye intloko yembewu ebonisa iimpawu. Gwema iifoto ezibonisa isityalo sonke okanye ukuba nezandla kunye neminwe kwindlela yesityalo okanye isifo. Ukukhanya okulungileyo kunye nokugxila okulungileyo kunceda kakhulu. Ukuba ikliniki yezityalo inika iziphumo ezingachanekanga nceda usazise njengoko olu lwazi lusinceda ukuba sisiqeqeshele ikamva. Ngoku sixilonga izifo kwiCassava, Yam, Maize kunye neSorgum. Kodwa kungekudala kuza kongezelelwa izityalo nezifo ezingakumbi.

directMsg.title: Usebenza njani umyalezo othe ngqo?
directMsg.description: Ungathumela umyalezo othe ngqo kwabanye abasebenzisi. Basenokukhetha ukwamkela, ukungawuhoyi okanye ukuvala umyalezo wakho.Nceda ube nembeko nentlonipho. IFarmSmarter iyakususa imiyalezo exelwe njengengafanelekanga kwaye inokuthintela aboni abazingisayo kwisixhobo sokuthumela imiyalezo.

community.title: incoko yoluntu
community.title2: Ngaphambi kokuba uqale ukuncokola kule forum, masikhethe ukufikelela kwincoko yakho
community.localMsg: I-20 yeemayile zerediyasi ukusuka kwindawo yakho ebhalisiweyo
community.howdesc: Kulapho unokunxibelelana namafama, ababoneleli, ababoneleli ngezimali kunye namanye amalungu oluntu ukwabelana ngezimvo, ufumane iingcebiso kunye nokwakha iFarmSmarter Community eyomeleleyo. Ungacofa kumfanekiso weprofayile yomnye umsebenzisi ukufumana okungakumbi malunga nabo kwaye uqalise ingxoxo yabucala. Basenokukhetha ukwamkela, ukungawuhoyi okanye ukuvala umyalezo wakho. Nceda ube nembeko nentlonipho. IFarmSmarter iyakususa imiyalezo exelwe njengengafanelekanga kwaye inokuthintela aboni abazingisayo kwisixhobo sokuthumela imiyalezo.
community.blockwarn: lo msebenzisi uya kuthintelwa kwincoko yakho ngqo
